# progress

**Type Property**

Set when the Block is called to report progress during a long-running match operation.

## Declaration

```swift
static var progress: NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags { get }
```

## Constants

- **completed**: Set when the Block is called after matching has completed.
- **hitEnd**: Set when the current match operation reached the end of the search range.
- **requiredEnd**: Set when the current match depended on the location of the end of the search range.
- **internalError**: Set when matching failed due to an internal error.
